item.title: Create a Sqlite3 database for Spotify songs data
item.description: How to convert Python data frame to Sqlite3 database? It is quite easy in the Jupyter Notebook with sql extension. With this powerful extension, we can excecute SQL query in Jupyter Notebook, which is quite convenient. In this article, I would share my experience in creating a Sqlite3 database to store Spotify songs data in the 3rd Normal Form using Python. It is quite easy, everyone who has some basic Python skills can follow my steps and try to do it.
